mn42:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn42:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena verañjakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā sāvatthiyaṃ paṭivasanti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
mn42:2.3: “samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn42:2.4: Taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn42:2.5: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā’.
mn42:2.6: So imaṃ lokaṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
mn42:2.7: So dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ; kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti.
mn42:2.8: Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti.
mn42:3.1: Atha kho verañjakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā appekacce bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu; appekacce bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu, sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu; appekacce yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu; appekacce bhagavato santike nāmagottaṃ sāvetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu; appekacce tuṇhībhūtā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho verañjakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
mn42:3.2: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti?
mn42:3.3: Ko pana, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti?
mn42:5.1: “Adhammacariyāvisamacariyāhetu kho, gahapatayo, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
mn42:5.2: Dhammacariyāsamacariyāhetu kho, gahapatayo, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
mn42:6.1: “Na kho mayaṃ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa, vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa, vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāma.
mn42:6.2: Sādhu no bhavaṃ gotamo tathā dhammaṃ desetu yathā mayaṃ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa, vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa, vitthārena atthaṃ ājāneyyāmā”ti.
mn42:6.3: “Tena hi, gahapatayo, suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn42:6.4: “Evaṃ, bho”ti kho verañjakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
mn42:7.1: “Tividhaṃ kho, gahapatayo, kāyena adhammacārī visamacārī hoti, catubbidhaṃ vācāya adhammacārī visamacārī hoti, tividhaṃ manasā adhammacārī visamacārī hoti.
mn42:8.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ kāyena adhammacārī visamacārī hoti?
mn42:8.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti. Luddo lohitapāṇi hatappahate niviṭṭho adayāpanno pāṇabhūtesu.
mn42:8.3: Adinnādāyī kho pana hoti. Yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ … taṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādātā hoti.
mn42:8.4: Kāmesumicchācārī kho pana hoti. Yā tā māturakkhitā … tathārūpāsu cārittaṃ āpajjitā hoti.
mn42:8.5: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ kāyena adhammacārī visamacārī hoti.
mn42:9.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, catubbidhaṃ vācāya adhammacārī visamacārī hoti?
mn42:9.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco musāvādī hoti. Sabhāgato vā … sampajānamusā bhāsitā hoti.
mn42:9.3: Pisuṇavāco kho pana hoti. Ito sutvā amutra akkhātā … vaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
mn42:9.4: Pharusavāco kho pana hoti. Yā sā vācā aṇḍakā kakkasā … tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
mn42:9.5: Samphappalāpī kho pana hoti. Akālavādī … apariyantavatiṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ.
mn42:9.6: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, catubbidhaṃ vācāya adhammacārī visamacārī hoti.
mn42:10.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ manasā adhammacārī visamacārī hoti?
mn42:10.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco abhijjhālu hoti …pe… taṃ mamassā’ti.
mn42:10.3: Byāpannacitto kho pana hoti paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo: ‘ime sattā haññantu vā … mā vā ahesun’ti.
mn42:10.6: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ manasā adhammacārī visamacārī hoti.
mn42:10.7: Evaṃ adhammacariyāvisamacariyāhetu kho, gahapatayo, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
mn42:11.1: Tividhaṃ kho, gahapatayo, kāyena dhammacārī samacārī hoti, catubbidhaṃ vācāya dhammacārī samacārī hoti, tividhaṃ manasā dhammacārī samacārī hoti.
mn42:12.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ kāyena dhammacārī samacārī hoti?
mn42:12.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati.
mn42:12.3: Adinnādānaṃ pahāya adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, yaṃ taṃ parassa … taṃ nādinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādātā hoti.
mn42:12.4: Kāmesumicchācāraṃ pahāya … tathārūpāsu na cārittaṃ āpajjitā hoti.
mn42:12.5: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ kāyena dhammacārī samacārī hoti.
mn42:13.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, catubbidhaṃ vācāya dhammacārī samacārī hoti?
mn42:13.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco musāvādaṃ pahāya musāvādā paṭivirato hoti. Sabhāgato vā …pe… na sampajānamusā bhāsitā hoti.
mn42:13.3: Pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ pahāya … samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
mn42:13.4: Pharusaṃ vācaṃ pahāya … tathārūpaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
mn42:13.5: Samphappalāpaṃ pahāya … kālena sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ.
mn42:13.6: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, catubbidhaṃ vācāya dhammacārī samacārī hoti.
mn42:14.1: Kathañca, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ manasā dhammacārī samacārī hoti?
mn42:14.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco anabhijjhālu hoti. Yaṃ taṃ parassa paravittūpakaraṇaṃ taṃ nābhijjhātā hoti: ‘aho vata yaṃ parassa, taṃ mamassā’ti.
mn42:14.3: Abyāpannacitto kho pana hoti appaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo: ‘ime sattā averā abyābajjhā anīghā sukhī attānaṃ pariharantū’ti.
mn42:14.5: ‘atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭhaṃ … sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti.
mn42:14.6: Evaṃ kho, gahapatayo, tividhaṃ manasā dhammacārī samacārī hoti.
mn42:14.7: Evaṃ dhammacariyāsamacariyāhetu kho, gahapatayo, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.
mn42:15.2: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyan’ti;
mn42:15.3: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
mn42:16-17.2: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ …pe…
mn42:16-17.4: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā gahapatimahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
mn42:18-42.2: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyan’ti;
mn42:18-42.3: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
mn42:18-42.7: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ …
mn42:18-42.13: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā brahmakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
mn42:18-42.17: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā ābhānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyan’ti;
mn42:18-42.18: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā ābhānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
mn42:18-42.22: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parittābhānaṃ devānaṃ …pe…
mn42:18-42.38: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
mn42:43.2: ‘aho vatāhaṃ āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyan’ti;
mn42:43.3: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, ‘yaṃ so āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyya.
mn42:44.1: Evaṃ vutte, verañjakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
mn42:44.3: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti; evamevaṃ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
mn42:44.4: Ete mayaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
mn42:44.5: Upāsake no bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇaṃ gate”ti.
